hero.heading: Delivering on-ground environmental solutions for a climate-resilient future.
hero.description: Our mission is to conserve and restore water bodies and their surrounding ecosystems through hands-on action, scientific research, community engagement, and educational outreach creating sustainable, climate resilient habitats across India.

faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.subheading: Got questions? We've answered the ones we hear the most.

items.question: How can I volunteer with BlueDot?
items.answer: We run cleanups, restoration projects, workshops, and more. Contact us to sign up for upcoming events.

items.question: Do I need experience or skills to help out?
items.answer: Not always! Most of our initiatives are beginner-friendly. We'll provide all necessary orientation and guidance.

items.question: Can BlueDot support our CSR goals?
items.answer: Yes, we co-design nature-positive CSR initiatives that are measurable, transparent, and community-rooted.

items.question: How do you measure project success?
items.answer: We use a mix of ecological data, community feedback, and third-party evaluation to assess real-world impact.

items.question: Can I visit your project sites?
items.answer: Yes, we love showing our work! Visits are welcome with prior scheduling — just drop us a message.

items.question: How do I reach your team directly?
items.answer: You can email us, call us, or use our contact form. We typically respond within 48 hours.

items.question: We're a company. Can we partner with you?
items.answer: Absolutely. From CSR partnerships to employee engagement programs, we offer tailored collaborations. Contact us for further details.

cta.heading: Ready to restore what nature gave us?
cta.description: Connect with us to align your sustainability goals with real-world impact. Let's restore ecosystems and communities — side by side.
